College_Station.KORA-FM:
KORA (98.3 FM) is a long-running radio station in Bryan, Texas currently owned by Brazos Valley Communications, LLC. Its format is Country, with emphasis on Texas artists and groups. Its Program Director is Carly Evans.
Personalities include: Roger 'WWW' Garrett, who together with Carly Evans make up the Roger and Carly Morning Show, Brandie Alexander middays, J.R. in The Afternoon, Ashlen in the Evenin' and Dr.
